job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtRESPONSIBILITIESltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtWork with leaders from Data Science Product and Engineering to solve customer challenges with advanced data analysis and machine learningltligtltligtPartner with software engineering to deliver automated optimized pipeline for production productsltligtltligtWrite scalable Python code in a cloud environmentltligtltligtOptimize code for large data setsltligtltligtIdentify innovative ways to optimize the application development processltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtQUALIFICATIONS FOR THIS JOBltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtBachelors Masters or PhD in a quantitative field such as Statistics Computer Science Economics or Mathematicsltligtltligt3 to 5 years of industry experience in predictive modeling data science and analysisltligtltligtStrong expertise in Python SQL and related data science toolsltligtltligtExperience with Google Cloud ampamp AI platformltligtltligtKnowledge of Git or other version control toolsltligtltligtFamiliarity with APIsltligtltligtExperience in insurance or financial services is a plusltligtltligtStrong analytical and problemsolving skills with an exploratory curious mindsetltligtltligtRelevant successful professional industry experienceltligtltulgtltpgtltpgt
